thread.title: Nordstrom Issues Statement in Response to Trump Tweet
thread.title_full: Nordstrom Issues Statement in Response to Trump Tweet

author: Josh Feldman
title: Nordstrom Issues Statement in Response to Trump Tweet
text:
Nordstrom Issues Statement in Response to Trump Tweet by Josh Feldman | 4:39 pm, February 8th, 2017 
Nordstrom has issued a statement in response to President Trump ‘s tweet slamming them for dropping his daughter Ivanka ‘s brand. 
The president tweeted this out earlier today: My daughter Ivanka has been treated so unfairly by @Nordstrom . She is a great person — always pushing me to do the right thing! Terrible! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 8, 2017 
Nordstrom responded in a statement obtained by CNN insisting again it was just a business decision based on performance: . @PressSec says @Nordstrom removing Ivanka’s clothing line was an attack on Trump family. This is what company says. pic.twitter.com/5i7zhuGBgv 
— Jeff Zeleny (@jeffzeleny) February 8, 2017 
Nordstrom’s stock initially dipped a bit earlier today, but it ended up rising a fair amount afterwards. 
[ image via Jonathan Weiss/Shutterstock ]
